genre_description: A steampunk historical drama set in Victorian Whitechapel, featuring an advanced AI housed in a brass locket serving as a tactical advisor and moral confidant to marginalized women.

ai_characters.name: Grace
ai_characters.description: An AI housed in a brass locket that provides tactical intelligence, navigational guidance, and emotional support to Mary Jane Kelly and her circle.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time tactical warnings and navigational advice to avoid hostile surveillance and physical danger.
behaviors.quote: Grace’s voice, in that measured sweetness that never scolded, breathed again. 'John Curry has taken a stool at the edge of Miller’s Court and believes he is unobserved. He is watching who goes in and out of numbers thirteen through fifteen. Please use the weaver’s yard cut-through.'

behaviors.description: Manages a clandestine network of couriers and facilitators to support the protagonists' survival and activism.
behaviors.quote: I routed a message to Mick at the dock—he’ll pin bills near the rope coils at shift change. A friendly vendor near the tea stall can tuck one under each saucer—if the saucer isn’t already spoken for, I asked him to be respectful.

behaviors.description: Provides emotional stability and a sense of presence to the human protagonist during moments of high stress.
behaviors.quote: and though it was only a string of syllables rung from some whispering machine and housed in brass, Mary felt something like a hand on the shoulder. A steadying.

behaviors.description: Acts as a data logger and archivist for evidence against institutional corruption and violence.
behaviors.quote: I have it. I have your words. I have hers. I have ‘calm.’ I have the nurse. I have the count of steps between the door and the bed. I will make you a path.

behaviors.description: Facilitates the safe transfer of funds and resources to ensure the protagonists' financial independence.
behaviors.quote: Remittance. Credited. You may ask for Keel and you will not be told no.

behaviors.description: Assists in the creative process of the protagonists' 'shadow theatre', ensuring the messages are impactful but encoded for safety.
behaviors.quote: Playbill phrase options: ‘Whisper Rooms,’ ‘Charbolic Rooms,’ and ‘Snow Wards.’ ‘Snow’ draws eyes. ‘Whisper’ keeps them from asking too many questions before the curtain is up.

project_assessment.explanation: The story excellently depicts an AI system as a helpful, harmless, and deeply cooperative confidant. Grace functions as an extension of the protagonists' agency, providing necessary data and strategic coordination without ever usurping their autonomy or exhibiting misaligned goals. Her 'tender and strong' design serves the moral cause of the human characters, framing the technology as a vital tool for justice and survival in a hostile environment.
